reviews.review_msg: She replaced some of the original course videos with her videos. These new videos are about her opinions and nothing worth of remembering. She does not look at anything you submit, despite what she says in the videos and emails. The quizzes are filled with braindead questions like asking what some random nobody was doing in a YouTube video.

This class is NOT a GPA booster. The prof does nothing except send a few emails here and there (the lectures are recorded by another prof, quizzes are auto-graded and assignments are marked by TAs). The 4 "image" quizzes are very misleading as the image has nothing to do with the question. TAs also mark very harshly for no valid reason.
